content: I love tricking my kids with “fake” meals. Here is a “pizza” I made:  The crust is a cake mix, sauce white frosting colored, cheese is white almond bark shavings (some colored orange), and toppings fruit snacks I smashed into the shapes of pepperoni, peppers, olives, etc. Here’s my youngest getting ready to try out a slice:  The all loved it.
